org.scec.psha.twoD
Class GriddedSubsetSurface

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.scec.psha.twoD.ContainerSubset2D
        |
        +--org.scec.psha.twoD.GriddedSubsetSurface
All Implemented Interfaces:
Container2DAPI, GriddedSurfaceAPI, NamedObjectAPI, java.io.Serializable
public class GriddedSubsetSurface
extends ContainerSubset2D
implements GriddedSurfaceAPI

Title: GriddedSubsetSurface
Description: Implements the same functionality as a GriddedSurface, but only maintains a small read only window view into a GriddedSurface. The Gridded Surface actually stores the data points.

Note: SetLocation, setAveStrike, setAveDip have been disabled, this class is read-only into the dataset.
Copyright: Copyright (c) 2001
Company:

See Also:
